subject: Re: For Mike C.
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi,

I like the 12-469 and 12-470 because of the size, shape, and ease of 
use... plus they were the first two models hacked.  I did hack one of 
the other ones but I don't have that anymore.

- Mike
